annotations.description: The fans must be pleased with the show they have seen on the pitch today. There was no chance to get bored as the game was very attractive. Let's hope the players won't lose their passion and determination in the future matches. The visitors certainly had the better of things. The home team tried to find the weakness in the opposition's defence mostly using rapid counter attacks, while the away team played possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's all for today as the game is over.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) attempts to find one of his teammates, but puts far too much on the pass and the chance is gone.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 3 min. of stoppage time to be played.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) takes the resulting free kick from 25 metres out. He attempts to send his effort into the left side of the goal, but Salvatore Sirigu is alert and keeps the ball out.
Mark Clattenburg blows the whistle, Javier Pastore (Paris SG) is penalised for a foul. Barcelona are awarded a free kick from a dangerous position.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) fires the ball at goal from inside the area, but it's well blocked.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: 8:11 – this is the total number of shots produced by both teams.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Xavi (Barcelona) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
Adriano (Barcelona) swings in a cross, but the ball is cleared to safety by one of the defending players. The ball goes out for a corner. Barcelona can continue in their attacking effort.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) passes the ball into the box but an opposing player clears.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance for today's match is 45713.

annotations.label: soccer-ball-own
annotations.description: Jeremy Mathieu (Barcelona) jumped into the shot very unluckily so he deflected the ball in the countermovement of the goalkeeper and into his own net.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Martin Montoya leaves the pitch and Adriano (Barcelona) comes on.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Luis Suarez (Barcelona) scores a goal! He makes his way to the edge of the box without any help from his teammates and unleashes a shot that ends in the top right corner of the goal.
Martin Montoya (Barcelona) sends a lofted cross into the box which is headed clear.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) sends a promising through ball, but the defence is alert and cuts out the pass.
A pass into the penalty area from Blaise Matuidi (Paris SG) is intercepted by the defence.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It will be a substitution. Jeremy Mathieu (Barcelona) is ready to enter the pitch as Ivan Rakitic walks off.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) skips perfectly past challenges but misdirects his shot from the edge of the box. The ball flies a few yards wide of the left post.
Neymar (Barcelona) brings his opponent down with a tackle and Mark Clattenburg blows his whistle for a foul.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The goalkeeper punched the ball away after Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) took the corner.

What a wasted opportunity by Edinson Cavani (Paris SG)! He creates himself some space inside the penalty box and unleashes a decent strike towards the top of the net, but Marc Andre ter Stegen makes an astonishing save to thwart him. Paris SG get a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.
Yohan Cabaye (Paris SG) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Paris SG.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Luis Suarez (Barcelona) makes a great solo run and pulls the trigger from inside the box, beating Salvatore Sirigu with a strike into the right side of the goal. He makes it 0:2.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) is offside and the linesman raises his flag.
Neymar (Barcelona) is flagged for offside.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The substitution has been made. Lucas (Paris SG) has replaced Adrien Rabiot.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) commits a foul and Mark Clattenburg immediately signals a free kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) is about to take a corner kick.
Neymar (Barcelona) sends a pass into the penalty area, but the opponent manages to cut it out. Barcelona earn a corner.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) plays a one two with Edinson Cavani, but the move breaks down.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) fails to find a teammate across the pitch with a long ball.
Mark Clattenburg blows his whistle as Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) used excessive force in the tackle during an attack.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) nearly creates a chance, but his attempt to pick out a teammate with a through ball does not come off.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner kick from Xavi (Barcelona) is headed out of the penalty area by one of the defenders.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) sends the ball into the box from the side of the pitch, but his cross is blocked. The ball goes out of play and Barcelona have been awarded a corner kick.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) plays a through ball but overhits it.
Neymar (Barcelona) attempts to find one of his teammates with a sweet pass into the box, but one of the defending players reacts well and intercepts the effort.
Flag up against Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Lionel Messi (Barcelona) has received a yellow card for his foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Andres Iniesta is being substituted because of an injury. Luis Enrique sends Xavi (Barcelona) on the pitch.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Andres Iniesta (Barcelona) is having a really tough time right now. We are about to find out how serious his injury is.
Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) is unlucky with a goal bound effort from the edge of the box. A fortuitous save from Marc Andre ter Stegen stops the ball from going into the middle of the goal.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) takes the ball on and fires in a shot from 20 metres out. Marc Andre ter Stegen stops the effort which is headed to the right post.
Neymar (Barcelona) crosses the ball forward but it is intercepted.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) is caught offside!
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) crosses the ball forward but it is intercepted.
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Mark Clattenburg blows his whistle and the second half starts.

We are watching a run of the mill game with only a few moments to ignite the crowd. The players surely can surely perform better, they just need to motivate themselves. The visitors were superior in their performance through the first half. They were more active and precise. The home team tries to find the weakness in the opposition's defence, especially with rapid counter attacks, while the away team play possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has reached half time.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) is flagged offside and it's not the first time today.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) is cleared by the defence.
The ball is cleared after Blaise Matuidi (Paris SG) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. Paris SG win a corner.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 2 additional min. will be played.
An attempted cross from Blaise Matuidi (Paris SG) is cleared.
Salvatore Sirigu blocks Luis Suarez (Barcelona)'s effort from the edge of the box.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) swings in the corner, but the goalkeeper does a brilliant job to intercept the effort.
Maxwell (Paris SG) sends in a pass which fails to reach any of his teammates. Paris SG have been awarded a corner kick.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
David Luiz (Paris SG) deprives his opponent of the ball, but the referee blows his whistle for a foul. He's not happy with the decision!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: A yellow card for a tackle by Yohan Cabaye (Paris SG). Mark Clattenburg doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Andres Iniesta (Barcelona) attempts to find one of his teammates, but puts far too much on the pass and the chance is gone.

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG)'s poor effort is easily saved by Marc Andre ter Stegen. He connects well with a cross, but mistimes it a little, and it heads towards the middle of the target and straight into the grateful hands of the goalkeeper.
The flag goes up and the referee blows his whistle another offside by Edinson Cavani (Paris SG), who has already been caught several times today.
Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) will take the free kick.
A free kick has been awarded to Paris SG.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Mark Clattenburg shows the yellow card to Gerard Pique (Barcelona) for a heavy challenge.
Gerard Pique (Barcelona) smashes the ball upfield and Jordi Alba brings it down with a fine first touch.
Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) is able to continue to play.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Looks like Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) is struggling after picking up a knock. Hopefully he can run it off.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) sends a quick through ball into space for his teammate who is lurking close to the offside line, but one of the defenders intercepts and clears the danger.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Lionel Messi (Barcelona) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
Martin Montoya (Barcelona) attempts to send a pass but the effort is blocked. Barcelona force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) finds himself beyond the last defender, but the game is stopped by the referee after the linesman signals for offside.
Neymar (Barcelona) goes on a mazy run through the defence and gets within shooting range inside the box, but his effort to the middle of the target is thwarted by Salvatore Sirigu.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) and Lionel Messi combine well with a quick one two and their attacking move continues.
Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) sends a cross into the box, but Marc Andre ter Stegen comes off his line to gather the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Thiago Silva is substituted due to injury. Laurent Blanc gives a chance to David Luiz (Paris SG).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal Neymar (Barcelona)! Neymar (Barcelona) was put through by Lionel Messi and he showed brilliant composure inside the box to fire into the right side of the net. 0:1.
Gerard Pique (Barcelona) sends a long ball across the pitch, but it misses its target.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) decided to surprise the goalkeeper with a quick shot from the edge of the box, but his effort came back off the left post!
A cross from Neymar (Barcelona) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) tries to send the ball in front of the goal, but the opposition's defence averts the threat.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) receives a well played pass inside the penalty area and shoots. His effort sails well wide of the left post.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) and Martin Montoya combine well with a quick one two to trick their opponent.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) sends a sweet pass into the penalty area, but one of the defenders averts the danger.
Martin Montoya (Barcelona) sends an accurate short pass. Lionel Messi controls the ball with a fine first touch and is able to come up with a new attacking effort.
Paris SG hold the ball and display nice passing from player to player.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) attempts to find some of his teammates with a dangerous pass from the edge of the box. The opponent's defence, however, intercepts the effort and clears the ball to safety.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half has just begun.
The players are out and the match is about to start. Paris SG will have the kick off.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: We now know the starting lineups. You can find them in the match details of this match.
Mark Clattenburg was nominated as the referee for this game.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.

The fans must be pleased with the show they have seen on the pitch today. There was no chance to get bored as the game was very attractive. Let's hope the players won't lose their passion and determination in the future matches. The visitors certainly had the better of things. The home team tried to find the weakness in the opposition's defence mostly using rapid counter attacks, while the away team played possession football.
